## Dependencies

```{r}
pacman::p_load(
    ggmap, #spatial visualization with Google Maps and OpenStreetMap
    janitor, #simple functions for examining and cleaning dirty data
    readxl, #get data out of excel and into R
    sf, #set of standards that specify a common storage and access model of geographic features
    tidycensus, #allows users to interface with a select number of the US Census Bureauâ€™s data APIs
    tidyverse #opinionated collection of R packages designed for data science
)
```

## Load Data

```{r}
raw <- read_excel("data/Cook County Hospital Data Pull - 8-1-16 - 7-31-21.xlsx")

glimpse(raw)
```

## Wrangling

```{r}
zips_of_interest <- c(60000:60899, 60932, 60942, 60960, 60963, 61810, 61811, 61812, 61814, 61817, 61831, 61832, 61833, 61834, 61841, 61844, 61846, 61848, 61849, 61850, 61857, 61858, 61859, 61862, 61865, 61870, 61876, 61883, 61451, 61517, 61523, 61525, 61526, 61528, 61529, 61531, 61533, 61536, 61539, 61547, 61552, 61559, 61562, 61569, 61601, 61602, 61603, 61604, 61605, 61606, 61607, 61612, 61613, 61614, 61615, 61616, 61625, 61629, 61630, 61633, 61634, 61636, 61637, 61638, 61639, 61641, 61643, 61650, 61651, 61652, 61653, 61654, 61655, 61656)

df <-
    raw %>%
    clean_names() %>%
    mutate(
        allegation_tmp = str_split(allegation, pattern = "-", n = 2),
        allegation_id = map_chr(allegation_tmp, 1),
        allegation_label = map_chr(allegation_tmp, 2),
        zip_5 = as.numeric(
            str_sub(
                string = as.character(address_zip),
                start = 1,
                end = 5
            )
        ),
        address_tmp = str_c(
            address_street1, address_city, address_state,
            sep = ", "
        ),
        address_full = str_c(
            address_tmp, zip_5,
            sep = " "
        )
    ) %>%
    filter(
        zip_5 %in% zips_of_interest
    ) %>%
    select(-allegation, -allegation_tmp) 
```
